scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: "The Broken Tower" with three separate typescript versions with autograph changes.
Letter, 1926 Nov. 1, New York, to Yvor Winters concerns Crane's escape from a hurricane in Cuba. There is a brief explanatory note from Winters at the bottom of the leaf [1 l. typescript signed].
